items.content_html:
Most of AI 2027 feels fantastical, but this rings more true every day (July 2027):

Hiring new programmers has nearly stopped, but thereâ€™s never been a better time to be a consultant on integrating AI into your business.

Later in the Race timeline (December 2027), fantastical:

The 2027 holiday season is a time of incredible optimism: GDP is ballooning, politics has become friendlier and less partisan, and there are awesome new apps on every phone.

Iâ€™ve lost hope of friendlier and less partisan politics, at least in this administration.

Via Manton Reece.
items.content_text:
Most of [AI 2027](https://ai-2027.com/) feels fantastical, but this rings more true every day (July 2027):

> Hiring new programmers has nearly stopped, but thereâ€™s never been a better time to be a consultant on integrating AI into your business.

Later in the Race timeline (December 2027), fantastical:

> The 2027 holiday season is a time of incredible optimism: GDP is ballooning, politics has become friendlier and less partisan, and there are awesome new apps on every phone.

Iâ€™ve lost hope of friendlier and less partisan politics, at least in this administration.

Via [Manton Reece](https://www.manton.org/2025/04/15/ai-is-a-good-read.html).
